xuiSelector
directive in module xui

Description

Control used to easily select items.

Usage

as element:
<xui-selector
       [is-disabled="{boolean}"]
       on-items-click="{function}"
       [is-indeterminate="{boolean}"]
       checked
       [allow-select-all-pages="{boolean}"]
       [items-source="{ISelectorItem[]}"]
       on-checkbox-click="{function}">
</xui-selector>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
is-disabled
(optional)
boolean

Expression to determine if menu should be disabled.

on-items-clickfunction

Callback function to be executed when the user clicks on an item.

is-indeterminate
(optional)
boolean

True to indicate that the state of the checkbox is indeterminate.

checkedboolean

Checkbox status (lowercase).

allow-select-all-pages
(optional)
boolean

False to hide "All Pages" item in default item list.

(default: true)

itemsSource
(optional)
ISelectorItem[]

If defined, it overwrites the default items of the selector. Defaults are used and possible to be re-used from xuiSelectorService.getDefaultItems().

on-checkbox-clickfunction

Callback function to be executed after the button wrapping the checkbox is clicked.
